boardgame.name: Mystery Rummy: Al Capone and the Chicago Underworld
Mystery Rummy: Fall 4 â€“ Al Capone
boardgame.description: Mystery Rummy: Al Capone and the Chicago Underworld, the fourth title in the Mystery Rummy series, introduces some elements of Canasta with players scoring bonuses for collecting complete sets. Sets have varying numbers of cards in them, from Mike Heitler with four cards up to Al Capone with eight._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The four types of gavel card make cards accessible everywhere: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Agent Meeting_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; searches other players' hands, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Eliot Ness_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; searches the deck, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Search Warrant_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; looks in the discard pile, and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Raid_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; allows you to take an opponent's already melded cards, provided you have at least three melded. All these mechanisms help make completing entire sets for their bonuses something you can reasonably strive for _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; while also putting you on guard against your opponent doing the same._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

All our games are brand new in shrink wrap. Buyer pays for shipping. Shipping will depend on your location and the weight of game. We will discount shipping on multiple games orders whenever possible to ensure the fairest rate. We are not responsible for lost mail but will insure shipment, at your request. Items are shipped within one business day of receiving payment. Payment must be received within 7 days after the day you agreed to buy the item, and all PayPal or credit card payments must be made within this time period. If payment isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t received within these time periods, all orders will be revoked and proper feedback will be left. Unopened merchandise may be returned within 14 days of purchase for a full refund, less original shipping charges. Return shipping charges are the responsibility of the customer with the exception of defective merchandise. To return an item, please contact us prior to sending an item back to us. WA orders pay 8.5% sales tax. Please email us with any questions. Thanks Chum Chum Games customerservice@chumchumgames.com

Gryphon Games (GRY101471N) Al Capone and the Chicago Underworld incorporates some elements of Canasta to the Mystery Rummy series with players scoring various bonuses for collecting complete sets. Sets have varying numbers of cards in them, from Mike Heitler with four cards up to Al Capone with eight. The four types of gavel card make cards accessible everywhere: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Agent Meeting_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; searches other players_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; hands, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Eliot Ness_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; searches the deck, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;search Warrant_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; looks in the discard pile, and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Raid_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; allows you to take an opponent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s already melded cards, provided that you have at least three melded. All these mechanisms help you complete your sets, but also put you on guard against your opponent doing the same.
